name: Lost Chapter
description:
・Story
In the abyss, she is awakened by the cold.
She has nothing to hold on to, as everything is left in the darkness.

The girl moves on with a little light,
and leaves all the choices to you.

Guide her and find her lost self.

・Gameplay
This is a roguelite deckbuilder game where you aim for higher floor while making your own unique deck.
You can get different card or raise your stats by encounter various event and enemies.


・Features
Use card to attack enemy or strengthen yourself during combat.
There will be 40+ type of card where you can build various unique deck like magic-specialized deck and etc.
Althought the starting deck will always be same, you can add up to 30 cards to your deck in your adventure.

Even with same battles and event, you can unlock various H scenes by meeting condition such as having specific debuffs!
